statements: DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_id = 100 AND batch_number = 'A123'
DELETE FROM batch_numbers WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC' AND expiration_date < '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM product_information WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM product_information WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.' AND product_name = 'Product XYZ';
DELETE FROM Manufacturer WHERE name = 'ABC Inc.' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Batch WHERE quantity < 10 AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND quantity <= 10;
DELETE FROM ExpiryAlerts WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' AND batch_number IN (SELECT batch_number FROM ProductBatches WHERE product_name = 'Apple');
